MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G83 postcode area of Alexandria, affecting properties in Golfhill Drive  and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 7:13AM. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are still working on the underground cable fault affecting the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2PM. If this information changes then we will make every effort to contact you. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:35AM on 14 February 2021.
